verses.verse: O sons of Benjamin take refuge from the midst of Jerusalem. And blow the rams' horn in Tekoa; and set up a signal over Beth-haccerem. For evil looks down out of the north, and a great shattering.
I will destroy the daughter of Zion, the beautiful and delicate one.
Those feeding shall come to her with their flocks; they shall pitch tents on her all around. They shall each man feed in his hand.
Consecrate war against her. Rise up and let us go up at noon. Woe to us, for the day turns; for the shadows of the evening are stretched out!
Rise up and let us go up by night and destroy her fortresses.
For so Jehovah of Hosts has said, Cut down her trees and pour out a siege-mound against Jerusalem. She is the city to be called to account; in her midst is oppression, all of her.
As a cistern keeps fresh its waters, so she keeps fresh her evil. Violence and destruction are heard in her. Sickness and wounds are continually before My face.
O Jerusalem, be taught lest My soul be alienated from you; lest I make you a desolation, a land with not one living in it.
So says Jehovah of Hosts, Gleaning they shall glean the remnant of Israel like a vine and turn back your hand as a grape gatherer over the tendrils.

To whom shall I speak and give warning and they may hear? Behold, their ears are not circumcised, and they are not able to pay attention-. Behold, the Word of Jehovah is a reproach to them; they have no delight in it.

And I am full of the fury of Jehovah; I am weary with holding in. Pour it out on the child in the street and on the circle of the young men together. For even the husband with the wife shall be taken, the elder with fullness of days.
And their houses shall be turned to others, fields and wives together. For I will stretch out My hand on those living in the land, a statement of Jehovah.
For everyone from the least of them even to the greatest of them cuts off a profit. And from the prophet even to the priest, everyone deals a lie.
They have also healed the break of My people slightly, saying, Peace, peace, when there is no peace.

Were they ashamed when they made a disgusting thing? Yea, they were not at all ashamed, nor did they know to blush. So they shall fall among those falling. At the time I call them to account, says Jehovah.
So says Jehovah, Stand by the ways and see, and ask for the old paths, where the good way is, and walk in it; and you shall find rest for your souls. But they said, We will not walk in it.
And I raised watchmen over you, saying, Attend to the sound of the rams' horn; but they said, We will not listen.
So hear, O nations, and know, O assembly, that which is coming on them.
Hear, O earth, behold, I will bring evil on this people, the fruit of their thoughts; for they have not paid attention to My words; and My Law, they also rejected it.
Why is this to Me; frankincense comes from Sheba, and the good cane from a land afar off? Your burnt offerings are not for acceptance, and your sacrifices are not sweet to Me.
So Jehovah says this, Behold! I am giving stumbling blocks to this people, and the fathers and the sons together shall stumble on them; a neighbor and his friend shall perish.
So says Jehovah, Behold! A people comes from the north country; and a great nation shall be stirred from the sides of the earth.
They shall lay hold on bow and javelin; they are cruel and have no mercy. Their voice roars like the sea; they ride on horses, arrayed like a man for the battle against you, O daughter of Zion.
We have heard the report of it. Our hands have dropped down; anguish has seized us, pain like one giving birth.
Do not go out into the field or walk by the way, because of the sword of the enemy and terror from round about.
O daughter of My people, put on sackcloth and roll in ashes. Make mourning for yourself, as for an only son, most bitter mourning; for the one devastating shall suddenly come on us.
I have given you as an assayer, as a tester among My people, that you may know and examine their way.
All of them turn aside, they rebel, walking in slander. All of them are as bronze and iron; all of them are corrupters.
The bellows blow, the lead is consumed from the fire, the refiner refines in vain; for the evil is not separated.
Men will call them rejected silver, for Jehovah has rejected them.
